intro.greeting: Hi, I am Scheff. A full-stack developer in training.
intro.selfIntro: I build sites and apps to learn. I work mainly with React / Next.js, and Node.js backends. Recently I am exploring AI agent development too.

about.title: About me
about.content1: My name is Scheff Chuk, thirty years old, married, from Guangzhou in southern China. I am studying AI systems development at Tokyo Technical College and arrive by 9:15 each morning without fail. I don't smoke. I drink moderately.
about.content2: My bedtime varies, but I sleep seven hours nightly. Before sleep, I drink cold milk and read for twenty minutes. I sleep soundly until morning. I wake refreshed, like a child. My health examinations show nothing wrong.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.message: Please contact me directly at <Email>darthusian@gmail.com</Email> or through this form.

chatbot.message: You can ask the bot any question about me and it will find the relevant information.
